name: DRAWBACK (Lautaro Otaño)
description:
DRAWBACK

The game takes a couple seeconds to load, don't worry if you see a blue screen

Instructions

You must grab the key to open the door and go to the next level. However, when you grab the key the time and gravity start going backwards.

Controls
  • WASD/Arrows: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • R: Restart level
Credits

Material from multiple people is used in this game:

Expand this list for more details
  • jump.wav by jackkech
  • 8-bit Coin by timgormly
  • Hero_Death_00 and Hit_02 by LittleRobotSoundFactory
  • clinthammermusic-gamerstep-bass-triplets by Clinthammer
  • VCR OSD Mono by Riciery Leal
